title: Authors and Citation
text: Dray M (2022). tamRgo: Digital Pets R. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tamRgo: Digital Pets For R},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

title: Digital Pets For R
text: Tamago (egg) + uotchi (‘watch’) = Tamagotchi. Tamago + R = {tamRgo}. work--progress R package create care digital pet, using GitHub gists store pet ‘blueprints’. Secret dev notes (don’t click)

title: Digital Pets For R
text: Install GitHub : package depends {gh} interact GitHub API (.e. GET, POST DELETE GitHub gists) {yaml} read write YAML files (.e. format used pet blueprints).

title: Digital Pets For R
text: Create new pet (.e. YAML ‘blueprint’ written GitHub gist) care (adjusts blueprint’s status values). Generate new pet lay_egg(), : creates ‘blueprint’ (.e. YAML file) characteristics (user-provided ‘name’, randomised ‘species’, ‘stage’ life, ‘born’ date, ‘age’ days) statuses (‘hungry’, ‘happy’, ‘dirty’, scale 1 5) writes blueprint fresh GitHub gist sets Renviron value TAMRGO_PET_ID pet’s ID value (.e. GitHub gist’s ID), can read automatically package’s functions user doesn’t need provide pet ID time can also relase_pet(), deletes GitHub gist contains pet’s blueprint YAML file removes TAMRGO_PET_ID Renviron.

what: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: Generate Blueprint New tamRgo Pet

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: pet_name Character. name new tamRgo pet. seed Integer NULL. Supply seed value recreate given tamRgo pet's sampled values. Defaults NULL.

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: list. See details.

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
text: tamRgo 'blueprint' list two lists ('characteristics' 'status') stores information pet. sublist 'characteristics' contains: species Type pet stage Growth stage reached born Date birth age Days since birth sublist 'status' contains: hungry Hunger scale 1 (least) 5 () happy Happiness scale 1 (least) 5 () dirty Dirtiness scale 1 (least) 5 ()

title: Generate A Blueprint For A New tamRgo Pet — .create_blueprint
Delete A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .delete_blueprint
text: Delete existing GitHub gist contains tamRgo pet's 'blueprint' (list characteristics status values).

title: Delete A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .delete_blueprint
Delete A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .delete_blueprint
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID gist contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value stored user's Renviron.

title: Delete A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .delete_blueprint
text: Nothing.

title: Delete A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .delete_blueprint
Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint
text: Write new GitHub gist name 'tamRgo.yaml' contains tamRgo pet's 'blueprint' (list characteristics status values).

title: Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint
Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint
text: blueprint list lists. Contains characteristics status values given tamRgo pet. See details.

title: Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint
text: Nothing.

title: Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint
text: tamRgo 'blueprint' list two lists ('characteristics' 'status') stores information pet. sublist 'characteristics' contains: species Type pet stage Growth stage reached born Date birth age Days since birth sublist 'status' contains: hungry Hunger scale 1 (least) 5 () happy Happiness scale 1 (least) 5 () dirty Dirtiness scale 1 (least) 5 ()

title: Create A tamRgo Pet's Blueprint — .post_blueprint

what: Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron
title: Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron
text: Set pet ID (.e. GitHub gist ID) 'TAMRGO_PET_ID' value user's Renviron file. prevents user supply pet_id whenever interact pet.

title: Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron
Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID gist contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value stored user's Renviron. overwrite Logical. existing pet ID value Renviron overwritten supplied pet_id? Defaults TRUE.

title: Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron
text: Nothing. Updates user's Renviron file, prints messages console.

title: Set A tamRgo Pet ID In The Renviron — .set_renviron

text: pet_name Character. name new tamRgo pet. overwrite_renviron Logical. Overwrite existing pet ID value (TAMRGO_PET_ID) Renviron file? Defaults TRUE.

text: Nothing. new GitHub gist created message printed console.

what: Release A tamRgo Pet Forever — release_pet
title: Release A tamRgo Pet Forever — release_pet
text: Delete tamRgo pet's blueprint (YAML file) associated GitHub gist. Also unsets pet ID (TAMRGO_PET_ID) Renviron.

Release A tamRgo Pet Forever — release_pet
text: pet_id Character. GitHub gist ID gist contains given tamRgo pet's blueprint. default uses TAMRGO_PET_ID value stored user's Renviron.

title: Release A tamRgo Pet Forever — release_pet
text: Nothing. Interactive messages printed console GitHub gist may deleted.
